pageContext.claim: “Mandate net-zero carbon emissions for homes, offices, and all new buildings by 2030. That basically means no windows, no nothing. It's very hard to do... Mandate zero carbon emissions from power plants by 2035. Zero. We're talking about zero. Nothing can go in the air.”
pageContext.analysis: The Biden plan cuts "the carbon footprint of our national building stock in half by 2035."
